author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-J-Lease to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - J-Lease Co Ltd
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 400,000 shares on Tokyo Stock Exchange between March 7 and March 12
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 100 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/vZsGV9
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
